Maximizes the damage done by spells.

Costs [1] Sorcery Point per spell slot level used.

Spells that only target 1 creature can target two additional creatures.

Costs [1] Sorcery Points per spell slot level used. Cantrips cost [1] Sorcery Points.
For spells that don't shoot a projectile, the targets need to be close enough together.
